entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0137.9838] The element us-gaap:DerivativeAssetsNoncurrent with a value of 2,000 has been used in the filing with the axis BalanceSheetLocationAxis. This is the only fact reported with this element. Rather than using the BalanceSheetLocationAxis the filer should use the extensible enumeration element to indicate the location of the item in the financial statements. In this case the element us-gaap:DerivativeAssetNoncurrentStatementOfFinancialPositionExtensibleEnumeration should be used to identify the account where the element us-gaap:DerivativeAssetsNoncurrent is included.
Period :2024-09-30 Dimensions : us-gaap:DerivativeInstrumentRiskAxis=sgu:SubjectToMasterNettingArrangementMember, us-gaap:BalanceSheetLocationAxis=sgu:LongTermDerivativeAssetsMember Unit : USD Decimals: -3
Rule Element Id:9838 Rule version: 26.0.9 - sgu-20241231.htm 3440
